Solution:   Add #ifdef.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/ca359cbedd0d603124776e7a6ca0ae79ffc34cdc|patch 8.2.1991: Coverity warns for not using the ga_grow() return value>
patch 8.2.1991: Coverity warns for not using the ga_grow() return value

Problem:    Coverity warns for not using the ga_grow() return value.
Solution:   Bail out if ga_grow() fails. (Yegappan Lakshmanan, closes #7303)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1991: Coverity warns for not using the ga_grow() return value · vim/vim@ca359cb

attachments.text: Problem: Coverity warns for not using the ga_grow() return value. Solution: Bail out if ga_grow() fails. (Yegappan Lakshmanan, closes #7303)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/6a07644db30cb5f3d0c6dc5eb2c348b6289da553|patch 8.2.1990: cursor position wrong in terminal popup with finished…>
patch 8.2.1990: cursor position wrong in terminal popup with finished job

Problem:    Cursor position wrong in terminal popup with finished job.
Solution:   Only add the top and left offset when not done already.
            (closes #7298)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1990: cursor position wrong in terminal popup with finished… · vim/vim@6a07644
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1990: cursor position wrong in terminal popup with finished… · vim/vim@6a07644
attachments.text: … job Problem: Cursor position wrong in terminal popup with finished job. Solution: Only add the top and left offset when not done already. (closes #7298)
